p: Most EOs are nontoxic to mammals and fish, but they are good as pesticides ( 115). Generally, the chemical compounds that are present in EOs have no remarkable risk that is derived from oral intake. Therefore, the toxicity of EOs is principally related to the compounds that exist in the EO. It has been reported that most of the EO constituents, even at high levels, exhibited no carcinogenic effects ( 116).
